body:
The following cubes are updated automatically (via the MakeFile I think) on each new release so should not be copied across from a previous version when importing...
release/Magarena/mods/legacy_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/extended_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/standard_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/modern_cube.txt
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Import incorrectly overwrites default cubes.

comments.body: Also, I think it would be better if cubes were placed in a separate "release/Magarena/cubes" folder instead of lumping them in with the themes.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
"Fixed" status still appears as an Open issue. Try "Done".

**Status:** Done
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 11, 2014 14:44:36_

The following cubes are updated automatically (via the MakeFile I think) on each new release so should not be copied across from a previous version when importing...
release/Magarena/mods/legacy_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/extended_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/standard_cube.txt \
release/Magarena/mods/modern_cube.txt

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=647_
